resources.string: Design and Development by\n Computer Science and Engineering Department\n Jashore University of Science and Technology, Jashore.
Simply follow the Sign up and Login instructions to complete your registration to use this application. Here are some issues that you may concern
Please create a strong sassword with minimum 6 characters
Please enter your corresponding department or section or any other category.
After fill up all the input, click on the Sign Up button.
Now this notify you that a email verification link has been sent to your email so, please go to your email and confirm that the given email has real existence/correct.
After verifying your email address please fill up the Login form and click on Login button. Now enjoy our application and don\'t forget to share your opinion to us.
All the input filling up is same for this particular except Department/Section field. For this particular field we have to obey the following instructions.

In this field we have to set the exact name of the faculty with the exact patterns. The must followed pattern is like- \'Faculty of Engineering and Technology\'. We have to set the name which starts with \'Faculty of\' keyword.
For faculties, staff and general students:
